meta.page_title: Book Karma Royal Haathi Mahal & relax on Cavelossim Beach, Goa India
meta.description: Located in Cavelossim, a small fishing village in South Goa, a few minutes walk from Mobor Beach this luxury resort makes for the perfect vacation.

web.text: Just a seven-minute walk from the pristine silver sands of Cavelossim Beach, this charming and vibrant resort offers everything you need to embrace the Goan way of life. Relax and unwind with cocktails at the swim-up pool bar, rejuvenate with therapeutic spa treatments, or indulge in exquisite cuisine at Casa Lisboa. Beyond the resort’s beautifully landscaped grounds, you’ll find one of India’s most vibrant, welcoming, and dynamic regions, ready to be explored.

app.text: Karma Royal Haathi Mahal, a Cavelossim Hotel Goa, is just seven minutes from Cavelossim Beach. This resort offers relaxation with a swim-up pool bar, an English Pub, signature Karma spa treatments, a fun filled activities center, dining at the Casa Lisboa Restaurant and more. Explore one of India’s most vibrant and welcoming regions just beyond the resort.

sections.copy: Your home at Karma Royal Haathi Mahal awaits in one of our spacious hotel rooms with private balconies, or choose from the fully-equipped Members-only apartments, set amidst the resort's lush, landscaped gardens.

categories.description: Designed for two guests with twin or double beds, spacious balconies, and a walk-in shower. Includes TV with Satellite Connectivity, Wi-Fi, mini fridge, sofa, tea/coffee maker, and in-room safe. Amenities are replenished as per consumption. Lift access available.
A cosy studio with a queen bed, two-seater sofa, en-suite bathroom, kitchenette, and large balcony—ideal for a relaxing, convenient getaway.
A flexible studio featuring a double bed, sofa-cum-bed, kitchenette, large balcony, and walk-in shower—perfect for couples or small families.

Private bedroom with double bed and balcony, living room with pull-out sofa bed and TV, bathroom with walk-in shower, dining area and fully equipped kitchenette—your home-away-from-home with resort luxury.
extras: Access to six member-exclusive jacuzzis around the resort
amenities: Televisions in bedroom and living room

categories.description: Spacious apartment with a master bedroom (double bed), second bedroom (twin beds), and sofa-cum-bed in the living room—ideal for families. Full kitchen with induction cooktop, microwave, double-door refrigerator, and a 6-seater dining table. Bathrooms with walk-in showers.
extras: Access to six member-exclusive jacuzzis around the resort
amenities: Televisions in bedrooms and living room

sections.copy: At Karma Royal Haathi Mahal, you’ll be spoilt for choice when it comes to dining. Enjoy traditional Pub Grub at Attwood’s Bar - A Karma Clubhouse - a rustic English Pub with a billiards room, library, well-stocked bar, and a secret cinema room tucked away inside!

categories.description: Take a break from your swim and head to our stylish pool bar, offering signature cocktails, ice-cold beers, and delicious food all day long!
Poolside Tiki Bar with rum and coconut slushies, Tiki-inspired cocktails, smoothies, and soft-serve ice cream.

The Attwood’s Bar - A Karma Clubhouse - is a rustic English Pub with a billiards room, library, well-stocked bar and a secret cinema room. Enjoy a cozy vibe with a full-size pool table and live sports on TV including EPL, IPL and more.
Enjoy Portuguese/Goan, Indian and European cuisine by award-winning Chef Kundan Jha. Opt for a bespoke candlelit dinner with a personal butler. In-room dining daily 7:30am–10:30pm.

sections.copy: Each day at Karma Royal Haathi Mahal offers entertainment, relaxation, and adventure. ‘Haathi Mahal’ (Elephant Palace) reflects reverence for Lord Ganesh—spot the Ganesh statues around the property.

categories.description: Balinese massages, detox steam rituals, manicures, pedicures and facials—pure relaxation and rejuvenation.

Cool off in three expansive pools. Kids love the water slide and tranquil waterfall at the aqua play space. With three pools and a built-in whirlpool, there’s room for water polo, swimming, or a peaceful paddle.
Next to the main pool: table tennis, carrom, pool, foosball, gaming station, air hockey and board games (chess, monopoly). Also: outdoor coconut shy and bicycles.
Intimate private cinema (access via Attwood’s Pub) with children’s films each afternoon and the latest blockbusters in the evening.
Fully equipped gym. Trained instructor available for guided stretches and exercises tailored to your body, age and medical considerations.
On-site mini store with groceries, dairy, and beers, wines & spirits for in-room consumption—all at MRP rates.
Exclusive kids’ space near the Activities Centre with daily activities like pot painting, crafts and treasure hunts, plus a play zone and nearby bouncy castle.
Member-exclusive lounge by the terrace gardens with comfortable AC seating, library, computer, television and outdoor garden.
Quick bites: freshly made puffs, sandwiches, cakes and coffee—perfect before a day of exploration.

sections.note: One of India’s most dynamic, vibrant, and welcoming regions awaits exploration.

sections.copy: For detailed information about Karma Royal Haathi Mahal, please check the official Fact Sheet.
